title: Spellbound in His Arms
description: #1 Bestseller, Winner of the Crowned Heart Award for Excellence from InD'tale Magazine, Finalist for the 2014 RONE Award in the Mystery Category   Reporter Jackie Alexander and Detective Michael Apostolou are forced to work together to investigate the mysterious deaths of the heirs to the incredible fortune of Greek tycoon Andreas Demiris. But their suspicions and unanswered questions are devouring them, just like their rising passion for each other.    This is a new release of an edition originally published by Booktrope.
author: Angel Sefer
